divy5:3: anyatamo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ dūrādeva dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṁ vyāmaprabhālaṁkṛtaṁ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṁ jaṅgamamiva parvataṁ samantato bhadrakaṁ dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantamabhigamya gāthābhiḥ stotumārabdhah— suvarṇavarṇo nayanābhirāmaḥ prītyākaraḥ sarvaguṇairupetaḥ |
divy5:8: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti, pūrvavad yāvad bhagavata ūrṇāyāmantarhitāḥ |
divy5:9: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṁ papraccha— nānāvidho raṅgasahasracitro vaktrāntarānnṣkramitaḥ kalāpaḥ |
divy5:11: gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— vigatodbhavā dainyamadaprahīṇā buddhā jagatyuttamahetubhūtāḥ |
divy5:13: tatkālaṁ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṁ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām |
divy5:16: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṁ śrotuṁ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ (5)|
divy5:20: nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti |
divy5:21: dṛṣṭaste ānanda brāhmaṇo yena tathāgato gāthayā abhiṣṭutah? dṛṣṭo bhadanta |
divy5:22: asau anena kuśalamūlena viṁśatikalpaṁ vinipātaṁ na gamiṣyati |
divy5:23: kiṁ tu devāṁśca manuṣyāṁśca gatvā saṁsṛtya paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe stavārho nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati |
divy5:24: bhikṣavaḥ saṁśayajātāḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—paśya bhadanta anena brāhmaṇena bhagavānekayā gāthayā stuto bhagavatā ca pratyekāyāṁ bodhau vyākṛta iti |
divy5:25: bhagavānāha—na bhikṣava etarhi, yathā atīte ’dhvani anenāhamekayā gāthayā stutaḥ, mayā ca pañcasu grāmavareṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
divy5:26: tacchṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye |
divy5:28: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo ’tīte ’dhvani vārāṇasyāṁ nagaryāṁ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṁ kārayati ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca |
divy5:32: gaccha, asya rājñaḥ kaccidanukūlaṁ bhāṣitaṁ kṛtvā kadācit kiṁcit śītatrāṇaṁ saṁpadyata iti |
divy5:35: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ tāvadrājānaṁ stunomi āhosvid hastināgamiti |
divy5:38: gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— erāvaṇasyākṛtitulyadeho rūpopapanno varalakṣaṇaiśca |
divy5:42: tato rājā abhiprasanno gāthāṁ bhāṣate— yo me gajendro dayito manāpaḥ prītiprado dṛṣṭiharo narāṇām |
divy5:43: taṁ bhāṣase varṇapadāni tasya dadāmi te grāmavarāṇi pañca (7)|
divy5:46: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo ’sau hastināgaḥ, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena |
divy5:47: tadāpyahamanenaikayā gāthayā stutaḥ, mayā cāyaṁ pañcagrāmavareṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
divy5:48: etarhi anenaikagāthayā stutaḥ, mayāpi cāyaṁ pratyekabodhau vyākṛta iti |
